data.title: Sitamarhi District Village Information Directory of Bihar
data.meta_description: Get Sitamarhi District village information for the location map, census code, geographical area, population categorized by taluka of Bihar, India.
data.text:
Vill

The Indian Village Information Directory for State, District and Taluka of India.

VillBiharSitamarhi

Sitamarhi District Village Directory

As per 2011 Census Data, 834 villages are in Sitamarhi District of Bihar, India. These vills are located in the Bairgania, Bajpatti, Bathnaha, Belsand, Bokhara, Charaut, Dumra, Majorganj, Nanpur, Parihar, Parsauni, Pupri, Riga, Runisaidpur, Sonbarsa, Suppi and Sursand talukas. The total population of this district is 3233076+.
